title: Engineering Program Manager, App Store Analytics - Apple Services Engineering (ASE)
summary: The Apple Services Engineering (ASE) team powers the App Store, Apple TV, Apple Music, and more, delivering entertainment in over 35 languages to over 150 countries. Apple Services Engineering Program Managers partner with Engineers to build end-to-end solutions that align with Apple's vision of privacy and innovation.
description: Our program managers are responsible for shipping new features for the App Store analytics platform. We're looking for a technical program manager with a strong project management toolkit to deliver complex projects under demanding timelines. This is a hands-on position where you will be involved in requirements analysis, design discussions, testing, privacy reviews, and more.
preferred_qualifications: Ability to handle multiple simultaneous technical projects, align priorities with stakeholders, translate business objectives into actionable programs, facilitate cross-functional projects effectively, maintain project schedules, and more. Background in Information Systems, Computer Science, or Engineering is preferred.
pay_benefits: At Apple, the base pay for this role is between $157,000 and $278,900, based on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Employees have opportunities to become Apple shareholders, receive benefits including medical coverage and retirement benefits, access to discounted products and free services, educational reimbursement, bonuses, stock awards, and relocation assistance.
